content: A `Skeleton` is a placeholder used to show a loading state. By default, it takes the shape of its children. It can also be used as a standalone component by applying classes to it directly.
You can control when the skeleton animation stops and the actual content is revealed by using the `isLoaded` prop. When `isLoaded` is true, the children are shown.
The Skeleton component has two slots: `base` (for the animated placeholder) and `content` (for the actual children when loaded).
